metadata.synopsis: The player has fail to disarm a KillSwitch, which has detonated the Iron Throne. The player feels the distant explosion as a rumble in the ground.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReConuse Roll HorribleGo to -1955; -4; 388kill S_LOW_BaneiteOfficer06_0ce716ac-f6fa-4b7d-8fda-456b0e74f90finteract with the dropped kill switchobserve cutscene play

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *You hear an explosion, the earth shuddering beneath your feet in response. It must have come from somewhere nearby, perhaps in Grey Harbour.*
